pages.text: The portable audio can be picked up by the maid, right-click it can open the GUI, play network music, and synchronize to players within 96 squares.$(br2)Currently only NetEase Cloud Music is supported, but we will add support for more music websites later.

Audio playlists can be added through the resource pack, but you need to restart the game to load these playlists.$(br2)The audio can be disabled by modifying the configuration, or you can mute it by adjusting the volume of the record.
